entry.title: Announcement: libcoin
entry.summary: In an email exchange on February 01, 2012 at 10:58:28 AM, Michael Gr√∏nager advised the recipient to use ccmake or cmake-gui to help locate boost as the CMake was unable to find it. The recipient mentioned that Boost was located in the standard locations of /usr/include/boost/ and /usr/lib/libboost*. When asked about the platform being used, the recipient responded with "Gentoo."
